document_data.name: Thalto Bresmer
document_data.mainbody: '''Thalto Bresmer''' was a traveling merchant based in [[Telflamm]], [[Thesk]]. He covered in the [[Dragon Reach]] area, including the [[Moonsea]] and the [[Dalelands]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|30}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 24: An Inn For Adventurers}}
document_data.Abilities: Thalto was an expert in fine furniture, ornate hardware for doors (locks, handles, and hinges), and [[hardstones]] in quantity, used in wall decorations and wood furniture inlays.
document_data.History: He was known to stay at the [[Whistling Wizard]] inn when passing through [[Voonlar]]. He called it "The most comfortable bad inn it has ever been my pleasure to stay in—quiet if shabby comfort, privacy if one desires it, and much entertainment if one does not."
